title: Prompt Engineering Masterclass

title: Newsletter BitAgora
description: Selezione articoli IA

title: GPT-5 and the new era of work
description: GPT-5 is OpenAI’s most advanced model—transforming enterprise AI, automation, and workforce productivity in the new era of intelligent work.

title: From hard refusals to safe-completions: toward output-centric safety training
description: Discover how OpenAI's new safe-completions approach in GPT-5 improves both safety and helpfulness in AI responses—moving beyond hard refusals to nuanced, output-centric safety training for handling dual-use prompts.

title: Providing ChatGPT to the Entire U.S. Federal Workforce
description: Today, OpenAI for Government is announcing a new partnership with the U.S. General Services Administration (GSA) to launch a transformative initiative. For the next year, ChatGPT Enterprise will be available to the entire federal executive branch workforce at essentially no cost.

title: Estimating worst case frontier risks of open weight LLMs
description: In this paper, we study the worst-case frontier risks of releasing gpt-oss. We introduce malicious fine-tuning (MFT), where we attempt to elicit maximum capabilities by fine-tuning gpt-oss to be as capable as possible in two domains: biology and cybersecurity.

title: Resolving digital threats 100x faster with OpenAI
description: Discover how Outtake uses GPT-4.1 and OpenAI o3 to power AI agents that detect and resolve digital threats 100x faster than before.

title: Welcome GPT OSS, the new open-source model family from OpenAI!

title: A Framework for Inherently Safer AGI through Language-Mediated Active Inference
description:

description:

description:

description:

title: Technical approach for classifying human-AI interactions at scale
description:
Semantic Telemetry helps LLMs run efficiently, reliably, and in near real-time. Learn about the engineering behind that system, including the trade-offs and lessons learned along the way—from batching strategies to token optimization and orchestration.

title: Anthropic revenue tied to two customers as AI pricing war threatens margins
description: Anthropic faces risks as $5B run rate leans on Cursor and GitHub Copilot as OpenAI’s cheaper GPT‑5 undercuts Claude, spotlighting customer concentration risks and enterprise AI cost pressure.

title: OpenAI returns old models to ChatGPT as Sam Altman admits ‘bumpy’ GPT-5 rollout
description: The pressure is on for OpenAI to prove that GPT-5 isn’t just an incremental update, but a true step forward.

title: OpenAI’s GPT-5 rollout is not going smoothly
description: It also failed on a simple algebra arithmetic problem that elementary schoolers could probably nail, 5.9 = x + 5.11.

title: ChatGPT users dismayed as OpenAI pulls popular models GPT-4o, o3 and more — enterprise API remains (for now)
description: OpenAI has announced GPT-5 will replace all models on ChatGPT. Many users are mourning the workhorse model.

title: OpenAI launches GPT-5, nano, mini and Pro — not AGI, but capable of generating ‘software-on-demand’
description: With safer design, more robust reasoning, expanded developer tooling, and broad user access, GPT-5 reflects a maturing AI ecosystem.

title: OpenAI's GPT-OSS 🤖, Ozempic anti-aging 👴, hardware has changed 💻
ChatGPT Agent 🤖, iOS Call Screening 📱, Google AI Video API 👨‍💻
Surprising developers with GPT-5
description: Five developers—Simon Willison, Claire Vo, Theo Browne, Shawn Wang, and Ben Hylak—are invited to OpenAI, not knowing who else is coming or why. Before GPT-5’s public release, they get full creative freedom to push its coding skills, design sense, and personality to the limit.

title: GPT-5: Our best model for work
description:
Meet GPT-5 — our most capable model yet. It figures out how hard to think, which tools to use, and suggests next steps so you can get from idea to execution faster.

In this demo, watch GPT-5 take our fictional company from messy customer feedback data to a working travel-app prototype in minutes. Y

title: Delegate work to ChatGPT agent
description:
See ChatGPT agent in action — researching, coding, and taking action online to complete an ecommerce business plan in minutes. 
In this demo, you’ll watch it:
- Find ecommerce and health industry reports
- Gather and organize data in a spreadsheet
- Build charts and a customizable business plan calc

title: Leah Belsky on how AI is transforming education — the OpenAI Podcast Ep. 4
description: AI is redefining how we learn — from personalized tutoring to entirely new teaching models.
